has_stats.label: Has Stats?
has_stats.description: Indicates whether there are statistics for this table

CREATOR.name: CREATOR
CREATOR.comment: The name of the creator of the label

ADDRESS.name: ADDRESS
ADDRESS.comment: Address that the label is for. This is the field that should be used to join other tables with labels.

LABEL_TYPE.name: LABEL_TYPE
LABEL_TYPE.comment: A high-level category describing the addresses main function or ownership

LABEL_SUBTYPE.name: LABEL_SUBTYPE
LABEL_SUBTYPE.comment: A sub-category nested within label type providing further detail

LABEL.name: LABEL
LABEL.comment: Name of the controlling entity of the address

has_stats.label: Has Stats?
has_stats.description: Indicates whether there are statistics for this table

BLOCK_ID.name: BLOCK_ID
BLOCK_ID.comment: Slot for which a block can be created.

BLOCK_TIMESTAMP.name: BLOCK_TIMESTAMP
BLOCK_TIMESTAMP.comment: The date and time at which the block began.

CHAIN_ID.name: CHAIN_ID
CHAIN_ID.comment: chain identifier, this will always be solana.  Field is used in joins with crosschain tables

TX_COUNT.name: TX_COUNT
TX_COUNT.comment: number of transactions within this block

has_stats.label: Has Stats?
has_stats.description: Indicates whether there are statistics for this table

BLOCK_TIMESTAMP.name: BLOCK_TIMESTAMP
BLOCK_TIMESTAMP.comment: The date and time at which the block began.

BLOCK_ID.name: BLOCK_ID
BLOCK_ID.comment: Slot for which a block can be created.

TX_ID.name: TX_ID
TX_ID.comment: A unique key that identifies a transaction

SUCCEEDED.name: SUCCEEDED
SUCCEEDED.comment: True when a transaction is successful, otherwise false.

PROGRAM_ID.name: PROGRAM_ID
PROGRAM_ID.comment: An address that identifies the program that is being interacted with. I.E. which DEX for a swap or marketplace for an NFT sale.

PURCHASER.name: PURCHASER
PURCHASER.comment: The wallet address that purchased the NFT

MINT_PRICE.name: MINT_PRICE
MINT_PRICE.comment: Price that it cost to mint the NFT in SOL or other currency.

MINT_CURRENCY.name: MINT_CURRENCY
MINT_CURRENCY.comment: Currency used to pay for the NFT mint.

MINT.name: MINT
MINT.comment: Unique address representing a specific token

BLOCK_ID.name: BLOCK_ID

TX_ID.name: TX_ID
TX_ID.comment: A unique key that identifies a transaction

SUCCEEDED.name: SUCCEEDED
SUCCEEDED.comment: True when a transaction is successful, otherwise false.

INDEX.name: INDEX
INDEX.comment: Location of the event within the instructions of a transaction

EVENT_TYPE.name: EVENT_TYPE
EVENT_TYPE.comment: The type of event (i.e. "delegate", "withdraw") that is occurring

PROGRAM_ID.name: PROGRAM_ID
PROGRAM_ID.comment: An address that identifies the program that is being interacted with. I.E. which DEX for a swap or marketplace for an NFT sale.

SIGNERS.name: SIGNERS
SIGNERS.comment: List of accounts that signed the transaction

ACCOUNT_KEYS.name: ACCOUNT_KEYS
ACCOUNT_KEYS.comment: List of accounts that are referenced by pre/post sol/token balances objects

INSTRUCTION.name: INSTRUCTION
INSTRUCTION.comment: Specifies which program it is calling, which accounts it wants to read or modify, and additional data that serves as auxiliary input to the program

INNER_INSTRUCTION.name: INNER_INSTRUCTION
INNER_INSTRUCTION.comment: A call from one smart contract program to another

PRE_BALANCES.name: PRE_BALANCES
PRE_BALANCES.comment: List of pre-transaction balances for different accounts

POST_BALANCES.name: POST_BALANCES
POST_BALANCES.comment: List of post-transaction balances for different accounts

PRE_TOKEN_BALANCES.name: PRE_TOKEN_BALANCES
PRE_TOKEN_BALANCES.comment: List of pre-transaction token balances for different token accounts

POST_TOKEN_BALANCES.name: POST_TOKEN_BALANCES
POST_TOKEN_BALANCES.comment: List of post-transaction token balances for different token accounts

SWAP_FROM_AMOUNT.comment: Total amount of the token sent in to initiate the swap

SWAP_FROM_MINT.comment: Token being sent or swapped from

SWAP_TO_AMOUNT.comment: Total amount of the token received in the swap

SWAP_TO_MINT.comment: Token being received or swapped for

TX_ID.name: TX_ID
TX_ID.comment: A unique key that identifies a transaction

SUCCEEDED.name: SUCCEEDED
SUCCEEDED.comment: True when a transaction is successful, otherwise false.

GAUGE.name: GAUGE
GAUGE.comment: Gauge that is being voted on

POWER.name: POWER
POWER.comment: Total voting power of the voter

DELEGATED_SHARES.name: DELEGATED_SHARES
DELEGATED_SHARES.comment: Number of shares delegated to vote for this Gauge

bytes.label: Approximate Size
bytes.description: Approximate size of the table as reported by Snowflake

row_count.description: An approximate count of rows in this table

TO_MINT.name: TO_MINT
TO_MINT.comment: Token being received or swapped for

TO_AMT.comment: Total amount of the token received in the swap

TX_ID.name: TX_ID
TX_ID.comment: A unique key that identifies a transaction

INDEX.name: INDEX
INDEX.comment: Location of the post token balance entry within the array for a transaction

ACCOUNT_INDEX.name: ACCOUNT_INDEX
ACCOUNT_INDEX.comment: Location corresponding to the index in the account_keys array

MINT.name: MINT
MINT.comment: Unique address representing a specific token

OWNER.name: OWNER
OWNER.comment: Address of the owner of the token account

DECIMAL.name: DECIMAL
DECIMAL.comment: Number of decimals in the token value, need to divide amount by 10^decimal

UIAMOUNT.name: UIAMOUNT
UIAMOUNT.comment: Amount of the token in the transaction

UIAMOUNTSTRING.name: UIAMOUNTSTRING
UIAMOUNTSTRING.comment: Amount of the token in the transaction in string format

BLOCKCHAIN.name: BLOCKCHAIN
BLOCKCHAIN.comment: In this table, always Solana. Used to join to cross-chain tables.

CONTRACT_ADDRESS.name: CONTRACT_ADDRESS
CONTRACT_ADDRESS.comment: Address unique to an NFT series

CONTRACT_NAME.name: CONTRACT_NAME
CONTRACT_NAME.comment: Name of the contract that identifies an NFT series. Example - tcgdragons

CREATED_AT_TIMESTAMP.name: CREATED_AT_TIMESTAMP
CREATED_AT_TIMESTAMP.comment: timestamp in UTC that the NFT was minted at

MINT.name: MINT
MINT.comment: Unique address representing a specific token

CREATOR_ADDRESS.name: CREATOR_ADDRESS
CREATOR_ADDRESS.comment: address provided by the creator of the project where mint payments and secondary market royalties are sent

CREATOR_NAME.name: CREATOR_NAME
CREATOR_NAME.comment: name of the project creator - this can be an individual or a company name

IMAGE_URL.name: IMAGE_URL
IMAGE_URL.comment: URL that links to the image on the ipfs service

PROJECT_NAME.name: PROJECT_NAME
PROJECT_NAME.comment: Name of the project the NFT token belongs to

TOKEN_ID.name: TOKEN_ID
TOKEN_ID.comment: Numeric value that identifies the NFT within it's series

TOKEN_METADATA.name: TOKEN_METADATA
TOKEN_METADATA.comment: a block of json that describes the traits of an NFT

TOKEN_METADATA_URI.name: TOKEN_METADATA_URI
TOKEN_METADATA_URI.comment: URL that links to the token metadata on the ipfs service

TOKEN_NAME.name: TOKEN_NAME
TOKEN_NAME.comment: Name of the NFT token - this is unique to token. Example SMB #284

has_stats.label: Has Stats?
has_stats.description: Indicates whether there are statistics for this table

BLOCK_TIMESTAMP.comment: The date and time at which the block began.

TX_ID.comment: A unique key that identifies a transaction

INDEX.name: INDEX
INDEX.comment: Location of the inner_instruction within the inner_instructions of a transaction

MAPPED_INSTRUCTION_INDEX.name: MAPPED_INSTRUCTION_INDEX
MAPPED_INSTRUCTION_INDEX.comment: Specifies the instruction which this inner_instruction applies

VALUE.name: VALUE
VALUE.comment: json object that contains the inner instruction

INGESTED_AT.comment: Time the record was ingested by the source

BLOCK_TIMESTAMP.name: BLOCK_TIMESTAMP
BLOCK_TIMESTAMP.comment: The date and time at which the block began.

BLOCK_ID.name: BLOCK_ID
BLOCK_ID.comment: Slot for which a block can be created.

TX_ID.name: TX_ID
TX_ID.comment: A unique key that identifies a transaction

INDEX.name: INDEX
INDEX.comment: Location of the event within the instructions of a transaction

EVENT_TYPE.name: EVENT_TYPE
EVENT_TYPE.comment: The type of event (i.e. "delegate", "withdraw") that is occurring

PROGRAM_ID.name: PROGRAM_ID
PROGRAM_ID.comment: An address that identifies the program that is being interacted with. I.E. which DEX for a swap or marketplace for an NFT sale.

INSTRUCTION.name: INSTRUCTION
INSTRUCTION.comment: An instruction specifies which program it is calling, which accounts it wants to read or modify, and additional data that serves as auxiliary input to the program

INNER_INSTRUCTION.name: INNER_INSTRUCTION
INNER_INSTRUCTION.comment: A call from one smart contract program to another.

INGESTED_AT.name: INGESTED_AT
INGESTED_AT.comment: Time the record was ingested by the source
